code:
---
title: Module 14 – Soft Delete (Education_ClassroomService)
---
sequenceDiagram
  participant ClinEng as Clinical Engineer
  participant Azure as Azure Backup Vault
  participant Workload as Workload VM
  ClinEng->>Azure: Configure policy
  Azure-->>Workload: Trigger snapshot/backup job
  Workload-->>Azure: Send recovery point
  ClinEng->>Azure: Validate recovery point & reports
repo_description: Repository for solutions built on Azure

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Clinical Engineer的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在Clinical Engineer完成整个流程。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: Clinical Engineer主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 从结构上看，我们有Azure Backup Vault、Workload VM。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Azure Backup Vault、Workload VM应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理Configure policy？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 你能详细说明一下Validate recovery point & reports吗？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最终，我们在Validate recovery point & reports完成整个流程。
